attributes.action: not use local road pricing schemes to produce a national network in the background
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I signed up to the petition urging the prime minister to scrap the proposed road pricing scheme. I read his response. I welcome his statements around investigation and further consultation before a decision is reached. I petition him not to allow a large enough number of local 'trial schemes' to drive introduction of national road pricing by a fait accompli stitching together local schemes in the background whilst 'further consultation' goes ahead.
